item.description:
We'll start with a mile warm up

Run 400 meters at a pace that is slightly faster than your training pace. Jog for 400 meters. Run 800 meters at the same pace. Jog for 400 meters. Run 1200 meters at your training pace. Jog for 400 meters. Finally, run 1600 meters at your training pace. Take a short break.

Finish the ladder workout by doing the entire cycle in reverse, starting with the 1600-meter run and descending to the 400-meter run. Jog an easy 1/2 mile to 1 mile to cool down.

Read more: How to Do a Ladder Workout on the Track | eHow http://www.ehow.com/how_2306920_do-ladder-workout-track-.html#ixzz2VOrGaO56
item.how_to_find_us: 1/4 mile north of Brandeis Roberts Train station - parking lot
item.name: Monday Night Track Workout - Ladder
